name: 5x5
overview: 5x5 is a Polish language puzzle-board game for two players, based on the TV show called "5 on the 5". The player's task is to guess a five letter password in five attempts. After typing each password the game shows the result. Correctly guess a letter is highlighted with blue color, the letter appearing in the password in a different position is highlighted with yellow color. Number of performed trials decides who won the turn and who will start the next one.
